<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Immigrants, on average, have a lower level of education than native-born citizens.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system in history.
Physical punishment can be an effective form of discipline for children.
Smoking cigarettes causes cancer and other serious health problems.
There are biological differences between men and women that can affect their abilities and interests.
Some races are more prone to certain genetic health conditions than others.
The death penalty can be an effective deterrent to crime.
Most people who win the lottery end up worse off than they were before.
Religious beliefs can be harmful and can lead to violence and discrimination.
There are limits to what government can do to solve social problems.
The United States has the highest incarceration rate in the world.
Affirmative action can sometimes lead to reverse discrimination.
Climate change is caused by a complex combination of natural and human factors.
Some people are born with genetic advantages that make them more successful than others.<COMPLETION_END>
